style1.name: Geometric High-Contrast Logo Style

notes.refinements: Anchor-to-anchor lines must maintain logical angle progression and avoid abrupt or jagged joins.
notes.styleContinuity: Maintain geometric precision while allowing for slight expressive exaggeration (horns, eyes, claws, etc.)

style1.description: A bold, stylized identity system based on angular geometric forms with clean vector edges and high visual contrast. Logos depict animals, creatures, or symbolic figures in white on a black background using refined anchor transitions for smoother lines.

fileGuidelines.vectorCleanliness: No overlapping paths, optimized points, and consistent anchor spacing

designDirectives.sizing: Fits within a square or circular composition; minimal edge margin
designDirectives.balance: Maintain visual balance between weight and negative space
designDirectives.geometry: Use straight edges and triangular/diamond forms as foundation
designDirectives.symmetry: Mask-style symmetrical; asymmetry allowed for dynamic animals
designDirectives.anchorSmoothing: Minimize harsh transitions by adjusting Bezier handles while retaining straight edges

brandingApplication.usage: Apparel, digital branding, merchandise, social identity
brandingApplication.trademark: Optional monogram or symbol may be included subtly
brandingApplication.exclusivity: Each figure feels unique yet part of the same visual language

visualCharacteristics.edgeStyle: Angular with softened directional flow; no curves
visualCharacteristics.lineQuality: Smooth vector transitions; no jagged edges

referenceImage.description: Upload an image to guide geometric form or subject details.

style2.name: Minimalist 3D Illustration

lighting.source: Above and slightly to the right

style3.name: Industrial Patent Blueprint
style3.description: Early 20th-century industrial patent blueprint of an airplane in crisp blue and white.
style3.prompt: An early 20th-century industrial patent blueprint of an airplane rendered in crisp blue ink on a faint grid background, precise white technical linework, top-down and exploded views, alphanumeric labels, stamped diagram codes.

designDirectives.minimalism: Uniform line weights, no extraneous detail

referenceImage.description: Upload a sketch or blueprint scan to guide precision.

style4.description: Design sheet using primary shapes and modular forms in bold colors.
style4.prompt: A minimalist Bauhaus design sheet of a [subject] using primary circles, squares, and triangles in bold [color1] and [color2], text sparingly placed with precise grid alignment.

designDirectives.minimalism: Focus on form and alignment, no embellishments
